document_data.mainbody:
New Breen was a genasi port city located in the Bay of Akan没l, in Akan没l, in the 15 century DR.
Most of New Breen was located on an earthmote floating above an island in the Bay of Akan没l that was considered to be the lower neighborhood of the city, named "Lower Breen". Many waterfalls flowed from an unseen source inside the earthmote and fell into Lower Breen, creating a curtain of mist. New Breen was said to be designed after Breen, a genasi city located in Shyr, a realm on their homeworld of Abeir.
New Breen was inhabited mostly by genasi.
New Breen was a prosperous city thanks to its port, located in Lower Breen, that served as a bridge between west and east Akan没l.
